summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 1st Avenue North, from the south margin of Comstock Street to Lee Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein concrete sidewalks and concrete curbs; providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 4988, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
